description:
In case you haven't noticed, I love the energy and enthusiasm that Draven brings to any video.
I wanted to pair him with a pro to see how he stacked-up, and WOW, this is a great video. You can tell both these guys brought their 'A' game, and are totally into each other.
It is kind of a long video because it had so many hot moments I could not leave anything out. From some great Ass to Mouth action, to Draven licking his load out of Mason's ass, there is just so many moments you will want to pop your own nut to!
tags: Sex Act - ATM Ass To Mouth
title: Draven & Mason Lear - RAW
